field.name: settlement_type
field.label: COM_TRAVELENTITY_SETTLEMENT_FIELD_TYPE
field.query: (select NULL AS value, 'NULL' as settlement_type from dollsfun_points.#__te_settlement_types) union (SELECT settlement_type_id AS value, settlement_type_name as settlement_type FROM dollsfun_points.#__te_settlement_types)

field.name: settlement_subregion
field.label: COM_TRAVELENTITY_SETTLEMENT_FIELD_SUBREGION
field.query: (select NULL AS value, 'NULL' as settlement_subregion from dollsfun_points.#__te_subregions) union (SELECT subregion_id AS value, subregion_name as settlement_subregion FROM dollsfun_points.#__te_subregions ORDER BY subregion_name)
